content:
Correct answers are:

* Upload a configuration script
* Modify the extensionProfile section of the Azure Resource Manager template

Explanation: To ensure that web server components are installed when the scale set virtual machines are provisioned, you can use the Azure Resource Manager (ARM) template to modify the extensionProfile section of the template and specify a custom script extension that installs the components. You can also upload the configuration script that installs the components and specify its location in the extensionProfile section of the template. The automation account and creating a new virtual scale set are not required to achieve this goal.
